details: Primary instructor for MEGN 441L Introduction to Robotics
Guided students through mechanical, electrical, and computer science design for robots
Taught software design, hardware validation, autonomous navigation, and exploration
Taught lecture course while instructor travelled to conferences
Keynote speaker for DECtech outreach for students grades 4 to 10
Taught AI toolboxes in Scratch for motion control in games
Keynote speaker for MAR-RET outreach for high-school teachers
Guided discussion on preparation for their students to pursue robotics in college
Taught machine learning and robotics on Jetson robots
Managed independant research for self balancing stilts and robotic hand design and control
